about_the_game:
Fabled Frontier is an open world crafting and action rpg set in a procedurally generated world inspired by fairy tales. Build your hero as well as a home!

Build your hero
Build your hero to be a raging warrior, trap setting ranger, beast summoner, or something else!

Explore the lands and beyond
Explore the procedurally generated world and discover what creatures and lands lie in it. Then find what lies beyond the massive rings on the water.

Construct a home
Create a place to rest up and get ready for new adventures

Key Features
  • Craft a custom character build from practically countless combinations of items, enchantments, abilities, and passive skills
  • Gather materials by engaging a wide variety of enemies
  • Visit different planes where each has various biomes to explore, creatures to fight, and resources to craft
  • Build a base

name: Fabled Frontier

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or Intel Core i5-2500
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X or Intel Core i7-7700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2070 / AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: An open world survival action rpg set in a procedurally generated world inspired by fairy tales. Build your hero as well as a home!
